name: BreakOut! (RealmOfHuai)
description:
BreakOut! is a small game my friend and I made in 6 months for our school module. This is also our very first game we made! Enjoy!

p.s. We are animation students, so this is wu huai's first time using ue4 to script the game XD

Synopsis: You are about to get executed. However, you manage to break out. Will you escape alive? or will you meet your death...

Controls:
Move - WASD
Sprint - Left Shift
Crouch - Left Ctrl / C
Jump - Spacebar
Open Door - E
Slide - W + Left Shift +Left Ctrl
Pause - Esc/P

Credits:

Game developed by Lee Wu Huai (RealmOfHuai) and Nigel Goh
Wu Huai - Character Artist, Visual Scripting, Animation, Sound Design
https://www.artstation.com/realmofhuai
https://www.instagram.com/realm_of_huai/
Nigel - Environment Artist, Level Design, Lighting
https://www.artstation.com/nigel_goh
Music - Eric Matyas

Made with Unreal Engine 4

IMPORTANT:
* This game will not be updated anymore as my friend and I are going to be busy with school and other personal project. I am really sorry. Feel free to play the current version of this game! Thank you for all your support! *

Known Bugs:
1. Enemy will be stuck at some area randomly ( hopefully he wont be stuck for your run )
2. If you die, there's a chance you cant click on anything (alt+f4 and restart the game if this happened for you)
3. if pressed ctrl+shift, your player will stop moving. (FIXED)

Visual Glitch:
1. White flashes when it's rendering the objects in game. (Apparently there's a occlusion culling issue, but I am not sure how to fix it)
2. low texture resolution when starting up the game (wait for awhile and it will fix itself)
